info.name: DelugeRPG Water Pokemon Theme
info.description: A Water Pokemon theme for DelugeRPG.  This stylizes the text, background, and other minor elements to add some color to your DelugeRPG sessions!  Tired of gray and white?  Take a trip to the big ol' blue!
info.additionalInfo: There are some very minor unimportant lines of text which aren't too visible due to the background.  These lines do not provide any necessary information and are just beginner beginner tips.
